name: Honeyed Carrots
keywords: carrot, green chili, honey, fall, side dish
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 pounds carrots, peeled and cut into slices one inch thick
1 small hot green chili, seeded and minced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the butter or margarine in a heavy saucepan. Add the carrots and cook, stirring, until they beginto brown. Stir in the chili and saute another minute or so.
Stir in honey, lemon juice, water and salt. Cover tightly and cook 10 minutes, until liquid has evaporated and the carrots are tender.
